settings.article_text:
We've said it countless of times, but since launching the original Power Move™ Trouser in 2017, this family of feels-like-yoga tailored trousers continues to be our #1.

After being 11x sold out, over 25 prototypes, and three generations later, we are launching our 5-Year Quality Guarantee*.

We’re passionate about our products and believe deeply that everything we make should be guaranteed to last. That’s why we decided to offer a 5-Year Quality Guarantee from any manufacturing fault* on our latest Power Move™ family of trousers.

If you experience a fault with your new Power Move trousers, you can return them to our store or send them back to HQ for a repair, replacement or a refund as part of the 5-year quality guarantee program.

A replacement, repair or refund will be at the discretion of the Dai product specialist once we have assessed whether the product has seen ‘reasonable wear & care’ and has not met our high standards of performance. Examples of things that shouldn't happen: fabric pilling or ripping, extreme colour fading, stitching coming away, zip breaking, hook-and-bar falling.

Simply email experience@daiwear.com, share with us what’s happened with some supporting images and we'll be happy to help, we’ll also pay for shipping if you purchased your product within a year*. Alternatively you can bring your garment into our store and speak to a DAI DNA™ Stylist who will be able to assist you.

settings.article_title: Which Power move™ trousers are guaranteed
settings.article_text:
The below members of the Power Move™ family have been stress tested for 1000+ hours by our Dai'namic. Since 2017 we have adapted our designs and developed prototype after prototype.

•High Power Move™ Trousers 2.0*

•Power Move™ Trousers 3.0*

•Power Move™ FLOW Legging*

*on purchases made after 17 March 2022

settings.article_title: What you shouldn't expect from your Power Move™ Trousers
settings.article_text:
• Fabric pilling or ripping

• Extreme colour fading

• Stitching coming away

• Zip breaking

• Hook-and-bar falling off

settings.article_title: Good things come for those who care
settings.article_text:
Here are our top tips to keep those Power Moves™ performing at your speed!

•Machine wash cold with like colours, lay flat to dry, cool iron if desired. Read our foolproof guide here.

•Eco tip: think green before you clean, and only wash when needed. And don’t forget chemically friendlier detergent options.

settings.article_title: HOW TO EASILY CLAIM YOUR Power Move™ GUARANTEE
settings.article_text: Drop us an email at experience@daiwear.com, or you can bring your Power Move™ into our London store and speak to a DAI DNA™ Stylist.

settings.article_title: What you can do to help us help you
settings.article_text:
• Send us clear photos of your trouser and the fault in question

• A description of the fault

• Your original purchase receipt or order number
